Capsule.rule: emit '['TransferSingle', 'TransferBatch']' if all the balance changes are reflected and the transfer conditions are met
Capsule.fn_interface: function safeBatchTransferFrom(address _from, address _to, uint256[] calldata _ids, uint256[] calldata _values, bytes calldata _data) external

Capsule.rule: not throw if caller must be approved to manage the tokens being transferred out of the `_from` account
Capsule.fn_interface: function safeBatchTransferFrom(address _from, address _to, uint256[] calldata _ids, uint256[] calldata _values, bytes calldata _data) external
